caption.p: qRT-PCR analysis of RNA interference (RNAi) target genes in Helicoverpa armigera infected with vHaBacΔegtdsJHAMT, vHaBacΔegtdsJHBP, and vHaBacΔegt. ( a) Detection of HaJHAMT; ( b) Detection of HaJHBP. The cDNA from third instar larval at 48 h post infection were analyzed. ACTIN was selected as the reference gene. Data represent the ratio of gene expression to ACTIN. Bars show means and standard errors (three independent replicates).
